definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: On top of this, Almaty was prone to earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，阿拉木图是地震城市。

sentences.english: This was exactly what happened in Alma-Ata.
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉木图发生的情况就是这样。

sentences.english: They were driving home from Almaty.
sentences.chinese: 当时他们正从阿拉木图返家。

sentences.english: The Almaty Television Tower was built between 1975 to 1983.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉木图电视塔始建于1975年，1983年完工。
